text: @JohnBoyega Okay,the comments the doctor made were absolutely disgusting, I'm not saying they weren't, but the actual thing they are talking about is that they are already going to test the theory that the tuberculosis vaccine might stop Covid-19 in Europe and Australia and MAYBE look for+

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
